p: The anti-inflammatory activity of ethanol extracts of stems of M. dielsiana Harms ex Diels was evaluated. The nitric oxide (NO) production in lipopolysaccharide (LPS)-stimulated murine RAW264.7 macrophage cells showed the highest inhibitory effect (IC 50 value 16.0 ± 1.5 μM). Isoliquiritigenin and tupichinol C showed the modest inhibitory effects on NO production having IC 50 values 31.2 ± 2.5 and 38.4 ± 1.9 μM respectively ( Dat et al., 2019).
